file_insights.changes: Documented critical service limits and edge cases
sections_added: Appendix D: Edge Cases, Service Limits, and Mitigation Strategies

patterns_discovered: Technical debt prevention through early documentation
gotchas_discovered: Supabase 500 MB free tier database limitation
Potential data loss or service interruption risks
recommendations: Implement data archival scripts for Supabase
Set up monitoring for database and service limits
Consider upgrading to paid tiers if free tier limits are consistently approached
Use client-side and server-side rate limiting techniques
Optimize Workers and Pages builds to reduce resource consumption
